SSP: Vučić zakonom o 'švajcarcima' prebacio bankama 152 miliona evra iz budžeta

06 Nov 2019, 19:45

Stranka slobode i pravde (SSP) saopštila je danas da je odlukom Vrhovnog suda o otpisivanju duga gradjanima zaduženim u švajcarskim francima potvrdjeno da je predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić "zakonom o švajcarcima" iz budžeta bankama prebacio 152 miliona evra."Umesto da se ljudima dug smanji za 70 odsto, kako je bilo očekivano na osnovu sudske presude, država je pre šest meseci usvojila zakon kojim se otpisuje samo 38 odsto duga. Da stvar bude gora, na teret banaka je išao samo deo od osam odsto", piše u saopštenju te stranke.SSP je navela da su banke time zadovoljene i da "spremaju finansiranje novih gradjevinskih i medijskih projekata SNS elite parama gradjana".

SSP: Vucic transfers € 152 million from the budget to the law on 'Swiss'

06 Nov 2019, 18:45

The Freedom and Justice Party (SAA) announced today that the Supreme Court's decision to write off debt to Swiss citizens in debt confirmed that Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic "transferred € 152 million from the budget to banks." Instead of reducing people's debt. The government adopted a law writing off only 38 percent of debt six months ago, as expected based on a court ruling. To make matters worse, only a fraction of eight percent went to banks, "the party said in a statement. .SSP stated that the banks were satisfied with this and that they were "ready to finance new construction and media projects of the SNS elite with pairs of citizens".
